name: Explorainium
description:
A 2d pixel art platformer game were you only collect coins to win

note! 

I was a completely a beginner to the engine 

while i was creating this game.

so this game is not perfect but i wanted to share 

this game and get some comments which will          

motivate me.Thank you all who have spended

their valuable time to play my game. :)

move = A/D or left and right arrow key

jump = space

if you see any bugs pls report us
